translation: The name ‘Allah’ solely belongs to the One and Only God
description: "Allah" is the personal name of god. Who is one, the owner of entire universes without any partnership. Neither He has born someone nor He is born by anyone. He is unique in His personality and characteristics and no-one other then His is able to worship.
wazeefa:
"""Recite it as many times as possible for fulfilment of hajat.""
"

description: He who gives blessings and prosperity to all beings without showing disparity.
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Rahman 100x after wajib salaa to develop a good memory, keen awareness and be freed of a heavy heart.

description: He who gives blessings and prosparity, particularly to those who use these gifts as Allah has said, and is merciful to the believers in the hereafter.
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Rahim 100x after Salatul Fajr for friendship. Recite 100x after every salaa for safety from calamities.

description: Who is original owner and the real king of the universe, and everything is in His Hand
wazeefa:
"Recite Ya Malik frequently and you may be treated with respect by others. Read after noon for abundant wealth. Prophet
Khidr taught dua “Allahumma atal Malikul
Haqq. Allazhiy laa ilaaha illaa anta. Ya Allahu, Ya Salaamu, Ya Shaafiy” followed by Ya Shaafiyal Quloob” 3x"

description: He who is free from all errors, absentmindedness, is free from incapability and from any kind of defect.
wazeefa: Recite Ya Quddoos at sunset for expansion of the heart. Also recite to free heart from thoughts that cause trouble, worry and pain.

description: He who free his servant from all danger and obstructions. He who gives His greeting to those fortunate people in haven .
wazeefa: Recite Ya Salaam 100x to regain health. Recite 115x and blow on sick person for shifa.

description: He who places faith in the heart of His servants, protects those who seek refuge in him, and gives tranquillity.
wazeefa: Recite Ya Mu’min to be freed from the harm of the ego. Recite 36x when faced with danger and hostility. Write on paper and keep for safety.

description: He who watches over and protects all things.
wazeefa: Recite Ya Muhaymin after wudhoo 115x for inner illumination. Recite 5000x for 7 days for  success.

description: the all mighty the unconquerable.
wazeefa: Recite ya ‘Azeez for forty days between wajib salaa, for independence. Recite 41x fajar salaa for acquaintance with the unseen.

description: He who repairs all broken things, Who completes that which is incomplete, and Who has the ability, with force, to make people do whatever He wants.
wazeefa:
"Recite Ya Jabbar 262x every day each
time and you should not be compelled to do anything. Recite for safety against
tyrant. If engraved on a ring it will enhance presence in front of others."

description: He who shows His greatness in all things and in all ways.
wazeefa: Begin every act with Ya Mutakkabir for successful completion. Recite 10x before intimacy for a righteous child.

description: He who creates every thing from nothing and creates all things with the knowledge of what will happen to them.
wazeefa:
"Recite ya Khaliq 100x at seven nights to
act for His sake. If recited at night angels will pray till the end of the night."

description: He who creates all things in proportion.
wazeefa: Recite ya Baari’ frequently and hard work should become easy. For conceiving fast for 7 days and break fast with ‘Ya Khaaliq, Ya Baari’, Ya Musawwiru’ 21 times

description: He who designs and fashion all things.
wazeefa: Recite Ya Musawwir frequently and hard work should become easy.

description: He who is all-forgiving and forgive all sins.
wazeefa: Recite to subdue anger. Recite 100x after Salatul Asr’ for forgiveness of previous week’s faults.

description: He who is victorious and dominate in a way that He can do anything He wills.
wazeefa:
"Recite Ya Qahhar 100x after fajr salaa to overcome your enemy. Repeat Ya Qahhar
frequently, to gain inner peace and be freed from being wronged by another."

description: He who donates all blessings to His creatures.
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Wahhab 7x at midnight for dua to be answered. If you have a desire, or cannot earn enough, repeat Ya Wahhab for three or seven nights 100x after a two rakat midnight salaa. For hajat, do 3 sajdas in the courtyard of a masjid or your home and repeat Ya Wahhab 100x.

description: He who provides all things beneficial to creatures.
wazeefa:
"Repeat Ya Razzaq 10x facing qiblah and then 10x in other 3 directions to remove
poverty. Repeat 545x for increased
sustenance. Write and hang in workplace
to be successful. Recite 100x after Salatul Jumua’ if stressed and depressed."

description: He who open the solution of all problems, and eliminates obstacles.
wazeefa: With hands on your chest, repeat ya Fattah 70x after Salatul Fajr for the heart to be free of rust and be opened, given victory over the ego and be purified.

description: He who is all-knowing.
wazeefa: Recite ya ‘Aleem 100 times after every wajib salaa for intuition. For hidden knowledge, do sijda on Friday night and say ya ‘Aleem 100 times. Recite ya ‘Aleem for the heart to be illuminated. For haajat, go outside, pray 2 rakat salaa and then recite ya ‘Aleem 1000 times.

description: He who constricts and who has power over all things.
wazeefa:
"Write Ya Qabidh on a piece of bread with
your finger and eat it for 40 days to be safe from hunger, thirst, pain and the punishment of the grave. Recite 903x for safety from tyranny."

description: He who is the expander
wazeefa:
"Recite frequently for peace of mind, freedom from stress, and to gain love and
respect. Recite ya Basitu 10x after Salatul Fajr with open hands, and pass over face for self sufficency."

description: He who diminishes or decreases
wazeefa: Fast for three days and on the fourth day, recite Ya Khafidh 70, times and you should be free from harm. Recite 10x every day for honour.

description: He who the uplifts and the exalter
wazeefa:
"Recite Ya Rafi’ 100x on Thursday and Sunday night to attain a higher sense of
honour, richness and merit."

description: He who makes one glorious, gives dignity, and treats one with respect
wazeefa:
"Repeat Ya Mu’izz 140 x after Maghrib salaa on Monday and Friday to develop
dignity in eyes of others and fear no one but God."

description: He who lowers and puts one in the abasement and disgradation
wazeefa: Recite Ya Muzhill 75 times when you sense harm from a jealous person. If you go to sijda and say, “Oh God save me from the oppression of so and so…” and you should be safe.

description: He who hears everything
wazeefa: Recite Ya Sami’ 500x after Zhuhr salaa for hajat in Thersday. Recite so that one’s words have a greater effect.

description: He who sees everything
wazeefa:
"Recite 100x Ya Allahu, Ya Baseer before Salatul Jumua’ for success in any task.
Recite Ya Baseer 100x after Salatul Jumua’ to raise esteem, strength in eyesight and illumination of heart."

description: He who judges and provides what is due
wazeefa: Recite Ya Hakam on Thursday night in the middle of the night frequently to know the hidden meanings in things.

description: The just one
wazeefa: Write ya ‘Adl on a piece of bread on Thursday night for obedience.

description: He who knows the delicate meanings of everything, He who creates things most subtle, which can not be understood by people, and He who gives blessings to people in the most subtle ways
wazeefa:
"Recite Ya Lateef 129x when stressed or depressed. Recite “Allahu Lateefun bi ‘ibaadihi yarzuku manyashaau wa huwal
Qawiyyul ‘Azeez” (12:100) 9x daily for ease. Recite 133x for abundance in sustenance. After 2 rakaats salaa recite it
11x for deliverance from poverty, illness, sickness, loneliness and misery."

description: He who has knowledge of the most secret parts of everything, and knows their inner meanings
wazeefa: Recite Ya Khabir frequently to be freed of bad habits. Recite it for 7 days to perceive hidden secrets.

description: One He who is element and the Forbearing
wazeefa:
"Recite 88x for subsidence of anger.
Write ya Haleem on a piece of paper and place where you plant something to preserve it from harm. Recite on an apple and give to spouse who has fallen out of love to restore affection. Recite on water for plants for better growth."

description: He who is magnificent
wazeefa:
"Recite ya ‘Aziem frequently to develop
respect among people. Recite 100x for success and protection from harm of enemies."

description: He who forgives all
wazeefa: Recite Ya Ghafur frequently for headaches, fever or temporary despair and despondency. Recite 100x after Salatul Jumua’ for relief from a heavy heart due to sins and forgiveness of the sins.

description: He who is grateful and gives rewards for deeds none for him
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Shakur 41x on water and wash your face to lighten a heavy heart and maintain composure. Recite 41x for any difficulty.

description: The most high
wazeefa: Constant recitation improves conditions – poor becomes richer, troubled becomes at peace….. If faith is low repeat Ya ‘Ali frequently. 41x for relief from difficulty.

description: He who is most great
wazeefa: If someone has lost his job or been demoted unjustly or has debts which cannot be paid – fast for 7 days and recite – Yaa Kabeeru antallazhee laa tahdil ‘uqulu liy wasfi ‘azhamatihi 1000x. Recite 232x over food and give to couple having marital problems.

description: He who preserves all things in detail, and preserves them from misfortune and calamity
wazeefa: Recite ya Hafeezh frequently a day for protection from calamities.

description: He who sustains
wazeefa: Recite and write 7x over water –drink from the water during a journey for strength to bear the difficulties of travel. If someone is ill-mannered, repeat Ya Muqeet several times into a glass of water and give it to the person to drink. Recite 7x on water for fulfilment of hajat.

description: He who knows in detail the account of things people do throughout their lives
wazeefa: Repeat ya Haseeb 70x on Thursday for seven days and nights and the 71st time say, “Allah al-Haseeb,” “God is my Reckoner,” and you should be freed from fear of being robbed, or the jealousy of another or being harmed. Write on bottle of colicky child.

description: One He who has wealth dominion and holiness
wazeefa: Write Ya Jaleel on a piece of paper with saffron and musk ink. Wash the paper and drink self steem.

description: One He who is Generous
wazeefa: Recite 270x for freedom from debt. If recited until one falls asleep then appreciation and help from others. Recite for forgiveness.

description: He who observes all creatures, and every actions under control
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Raqeeb 7x for yourself, family and property to be under Allah’s protection. Recite to find lost thing. Recite 312x to render bad vibes ineffective.

description: The one who response to every need
wazeefa: Recite Ya Mujeeb to continue to have faith. Recite 55x at sunrise after salaa for hajat. Reciting also helps stop gossip and slander.

description: He who is not visible with senses, but exists
wazeefa: Recite Ya Waasi’ frequently if you have difficulty earning a living. Recite 137x to cure depression.

description: He who has wisdom in all orders and actions
wazeefa: Recite Ya Hakim continuously to overcome difficulties in work and for knowledge and wisdom.

description: He who loves those who do good and bestows on them His compassion. He who is the only one who should be loved and whose friendships to be earned
wazeefa: If there has been a quarrel between two people and one of the two repeats Ya Wadud 1000x over food and gives the food to the other to eat, the disagreement may be resolved.

description: He who obstruct all evils from harming His friends
wazeefa: Recite ya Majeed frequently at iftar on the 13th, 14th & 15th of the Lunar month to cure sickness especially psoriasis, heart disease and depression.

description: One He who gives lives to all creatures on the judgement day
wazeefa:
"Recite Ya Bai’th 101x and to gain taqwa and wisdom. Recite frequently with hand
on chest at bedtime. Recite 7070x to clear name if wrongly accused."

description: He who is present everywhere and observes all things
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Shaheed 21x with your hand on the forehead of a rebellious child to calm him down. Assists in controlling one’s own disobedience.

description: He whose existence has no change
wazeefa: Recite to find lost thing. For sustenance recite 100x La Ilaha Malikul Haqqul Mubeen every day.

description: He who provides a means to solve all problems in the best way
wazeefa: If you are afraid of drowning, being burned in a fire, repeat Ya Wakeel for protection.

description: He who is the most strong
wazeefa: Recite Ya Qawiy for safety from an enemy. Recite 116x for strength to do ibada.

description: One He who is firm
wazeefa:
"Recite Ya Mateen for your troubles to disappear. To increase breast milk write
on a cup and drink water from it. Recite 500x to eliminate tyranny and negativity from oneself."

description: He who is the friend of His righteous servants
wazeefa: Recite Ya Waliy frequently to become a Friend of God. Recite in the presence of a spouse who is ill of character.

description: He who is the only one to be praised and glorified and thanked by all creatures
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Hameed 45 days alone 93+ time be loved and praised. Write on a cup and drink from it for refined speech.

description: He who knows the number of all things although they cannot be counted, and knows each of them
wazeefa: Recite Ya Muhsi 100x for ease on the Day of Judgement. Recite 148x to assist in understanding and memorisation. Twenty times twenty pieces of bread daily read this name someone who eats, creatures of God, God willing it will be subservient.

description: Ho who has created for the first time all being from nothing and without any model
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Mubdi’ and breathe towards someone who is about to lose something and that person should become free of danger. Recite to make decisions when undecisive. If a pregnant woman fears a miscarriage then place right hand on the stomach and recite Ya Mubdi’ 99x.

description: He who restores all thing
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Mu’eed 70x for the safe return in seven days [insha allah] of a family member who is away.

description: He who gives life and health
wazeefa: If you are weighed down with a heavy burden repeat Ya Muhyi 7x daily. Recite 68x after every salaa to cure a chronic illness.

description: He who creates death
wazeefa: Recite Ya Mumeet frequently with your hands on your chest on falling asleep to control your passions and destroy your enemy.

description: is all-knowing and His strength is sufficient for everyone
wazeefa: Recite Ya Hayy frequently for a long life and to cure sickness. Recite 500x before sunrise for peace. Write with musk and rose water on a bowl; wash and drink for shifa from any illness.

description: He who holds the entire universe
wazeefa: Recite Ya Qayyum at the time of Fajr salaa for friendship. Recite 106x daily for memorisation help. Recite it in seclusion for affluence. To remove lethargy and laziness recite Al Hayyu and Al Qayyum after Fajr salaa.

description: He who is magnificent
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Waajid with every morsel of food to become resourceful.

description: He whose highness is grate, Who is beneficent and His munificence is rich
wazeefa: Recite Ya Maajid 465x morning and night to be understood by others. Recite also to understand the language of other creation e.g. animals etc…. This name can be read in isolation so that the divine light Insha Allah  will shows on the heart .

description: He who is the only one in universe
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Waahid 1000x when you are alone and in a dark place to be free of fear and delusions.

description: He who is the only being to apply to if one has any need to be completed or in troubles to be eliminated
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Samad 1000x to know the hidden meanings of things. Recite Ya Samad 125x at dawn or at midnight while in sajda, to be safe from oppression. Recite to improve character.

description: He who is able to do anything in the way He wills
wazeefa: Recite Ya Qaadir while washing and no enemy should harm you. If you face a difficulty recite Ya Qadir 41x to be free from difficulty. Recite 305x when love not responded to.

description: He who is more powerful than any being
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Muqtadir frequently to become aware of the truth. Recite 744x to sharpen the memory. After nap, twenty times recite this name, all the work will be easier.

description: He who gives priority to someone others
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Muqaddim on the battlefield or when you are afraid of being alone in a frightening place. Recite to present things in their right places.

description: He who delays whatever he wants
wazeefa: Recite Ya Mu’akhkhir 100 times for tawba to be accepted. Recite 1446x before sunrise for 7 days to prevent tyrant from gaining power.

description: He who is existed much before the creation of the universe
wazeefa: Recite Ya Awwal 40 times on Thursday night for fulfilment of needs. Recite 1000 times for 40 Fridays for an overwhelming problem and for safe return from journey.

description: He who remain even after the destruction of this universe
wazeefa: Those who recite Ya Aakhir frequently should lead a good life and have a good end at the time of death. Recite 1000 times on Friday for increased sustenance. Recite frequently as a kaffara for sins.

description: He who evident with all his phenomena
wazeefa: Recite Ya Zhaahir 500x for divine light to enter your heart and in eyes.

description: He who is not visible with senses, but exists
wazeefa: Recite Ya Baatin 22x to see the truth in things. Recite 33x for enlightenment. For hajat pray 2 rakats salaa after which recite “Huwal Awwalu wal Aakhiru wazh Zhaahiru wal Baatin; wa huwa ‘alaa kulli shayin Qadeer”

description: He who directs, manages, conducts, measures, plans every action which happens at any moment in the entire universe
wazeefa:
"Repeat Ya Waali in your home to be free from danger. Recite 11x to subdue
another’s anger."

description: He who is higher then any action, manner or condition, and any thought that any being may  have. This name indicates that Allah is  High then the most evolved thought of  mankind
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Muta’ali to ease difficulties. Recommend for women tor recite during menstruation to relieve ailments. If demoted recite 540x to be restored to honour. Also effective for interviews.

description: He who is tolerant of His servants, to all creatures and is good to them
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Barr frequently to be blessed and be free from misfortune. Recite 7x daily to create aversion to bad habits. If recite 7x on an newborn baby it will give the child protection from calamities.

description: He who is the most Strong
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Tawwab 360+ times for acceptance of tawba. Recite frequently for accomplishment of a task. Recite 10x in front of a tyrant to be free from oppression.

description: He who constricts
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Muntaqim to be victorious against your enemy. To remove a tyrant from power, recite Ya Muntaqimu and Ya Qahhaar 1000x.

description: He who pardons all who repent sincerely as if they had no previous sin
wazeefa: Repeat Ya ‘Afw frequently for forgiveness.

description: He who is benign and compassionate
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Ra’uf frequently to be blessed. Recite also to gain affection of creation.

description: He who owns all that exists
wazeefa: Recite Ya Malik al Mulk to gain esteem and change doubts into reassurance. Recite 212x daily to gain sustenance from unexpected means.

description: He who is the supreme power, sovereign and munificent
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Dhul jalaal wal ikraam to develop self esteem.

description: He who does His work accordingly and in a balanced way
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Muqsit 100x to be free from the harm of your idol/ego and you should attain your purpose. Recite 700x for hajat. If the mind wanders in salaa recite 239x before salaa. Also recite for anger and depression.

description: He who collects thing, gathers them, anywhere He wants, at any time
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Jaami’ to find lost things or be reconciled with someone who has separated. Do ghusl at Zhuhr and lifting gaze towards heavens recite Ya Jaami’ 10x closing each finger as you do so to reconcile dispersed family.

description: He who is eternal in His self and in His qualities
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Ghani frequently for contentment. Recite 70x daily for abundance in rizq. Recite and blow over body for shifaa from illness.

description: He who is not indigent of any, but all look towards Him for help
wazeefa: Recite Ya Mughni 1000 x every Friday to become selfsufficient. Recite 1121x every Friday for 10 Fridays to eliminate nervous tension. Recite on hands and pass over afflicted part of body to recover. For spiritual and material wealth, recite 11x Salawat,from bigining  followed by 1111x Ya Mughni and end with 11x Salawat .

description: He who obstruct all evils from harming His friends
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Maani’ to have a good family life. Recite 20x to subside anger. Recite 161x to help relieve pain and fear. Recite for safety during journeys. Recite silently to rekindle affection between spouses.

description: He who creates that which makes one despondent
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Dharr 100x on Thursday nights to grow closer to Allah. Recite for safety from tyranny.

description: He who creates all thing which provides goodness and benefit
wazeefa: Recite Ya Nafi’ for 4 days to avoid harm. Recite 41x for completion of task. Provides safety on a journey. Recite before intimacy for pious children.

description: He who provides divine light to the entire universe, to the faces, minds and hearts of His servants
wazeefa: Recite Ya Nur 700 times on Thursday night for receive inner light. Recite Surah Nur 7 times and ya Nur 1000 times to gain light in your heart.

description: He who guides, gives success and directs His servants to do this beneficial to others
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Haadi frequently to gain spiritual knowledge.

description: He who creates wonders in the universe without any design
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Badi’ 1000 x by saying, “Ya Badi’ assamawati’ wa ‘l-ardh,” for troubles. Relieves depression and stress. Recite before sleeping for guidance on feasibility of task. For accomplishment of a task recite 1200x Ya Badi’ al ajaaib bil khayr. Ya Badi’ for 12 days.

description: He who was, is and live forever
wazeefa: Recite Ya Baaqi on Thursday 1000x night to be free of difficulties. Recite frequently for acceptance of duas.

description: He who has everlasting ownership of all things. Finite man only has temporary ownership, and at the death all creatures have nothing
wazeefa: Recite Ya Waarith 100x at sunrise to be free of difficulties. Recite it often to fulfil a task. To remove worries recite 1000x between Maghrib and Eisha salaa.

description: He who is the guide, with wisdom, to the right path according to His eternal plan
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Rasheed, 1000x between Maghrib and Eisha Salaa to remove troubles, and for financial progress. Recite also to make words effective.

description: He who is patient, and revengeful to creatures
wazeefa: Repeat Ya Sabur 33x for relief from troubles, difficulties and sorrow. Recite 100x before sunrise for safety from calamities and ‘tying’ the enemy’  tongue. Repeat 298x for physical pain. Repeat frequently if unjustly accused. In difficulty recite 1020x.

description: یہ "اللہ" تبارک وتعالی کا ذاتی نام ہے ، جو یکتا ہے، کل کائنات کا مالک و قابض بلا شرکت غیرے ہے ۔ نہ اس نے کسی کو جنا ہے اور نہ اس کو کسی نے پیدا کیا ہے ۔ وہ اپنی ذات و صفات میں یکتا و اکیلا ہے او اس کے سوا کوئی عبادت لائق نہیں ہے ۔
wazeefa: عزم و یقین کی قوت کے لیے روزانہ ایک ہزار مرتبہ پڑھے ۔ لاعلاج مریض [ یا اللہ ] کا بکثرت ورد کرکے شفا کی دعا مانگے ، ان شاء اللہ شفا ہوگی ۔

description: جو انسانوں پر بلا تفریق رحمتیں اور برکتیں نازل فرماتا ہے۔
wazeefa: ہر نماز کے بعد سو مرتبہ [ یا رحمن ] پڑھنے والے کے دل کی سختی اور غفلت جاتی رہےگی ۔

description: وہ جو برکتوں ، بخششوں کا سر چشمہ ہے۔
wazeefa: روزانہ ہر نماز کے بعد ایک سو مرتبہ [ یا رحیم ] کا ورد کرنے والا دنیاوی آفات سے انشاء اللہ تعالی محفوظ رہے گا ، اور مخلوق خدا اس پر مہربان ہوگی ۔

description: وہ جو پوری کائنات کا اصل مالک اور حقیقی بادشاہ ہے اور سب کچھ اس کے قبضہ قدرت میں ہے
wazeefa: بعد نماز صبح روزانہ کثرت سے یہ اسم  پڑھنے والے کو اللہ تعالی غنی فرما دیں گے ۔

description: جملہ غلطیوں اور عیب سے پاک اور ہر قسم کی بھول چوک اور نقائص سے مبرا ذات
wazeefa: زوال کے بعد روزانہ بکثرت ورد کرنے والے کا دل انشاء اللہ امراض روحانی سے پاک ہو جائے گا ۔

description: وہ جو اپنے بندوں کو جملہ خطرات سے محفوظ رکھتا ہے اور اپنے خوش نصیب بندوں کو جنت کی راحتیں عطا فرماتا ہے۔
wazeefa: اس اسم کا بکثرت ورد کرنے والا انشاء اللہ تعالی تمام آفتوں سے محروم رہے گا ۔ ایک سو پندرہ [۱۱۵] اس کو پڑھ کر بیمار پر دم کرے ، اللہ تعالی اسے صحت عطا فرمائیں گے ۔

description: وہ جو اپنے بندوں کے دل میں ایمان پیدا کرتا ہے  اور ان کی حفاظت کرتا ہے جو اس سے مدد طلب کرتے ہیں نیز ان کے دلوں میں سکون عطا فرماتا ہے۔
wazeefa: کسی خوف کے وقت چھ سو تیس [۶۳۰] مرتبہ پڑھنے سے  انشاء اللہ تعالی نقصان و خوف سے محفوظ رہے گا ۔ اس کا پڑھنے والا یا اس اسم کو لکھ کر اپنے پاس رکھنے والا اللہ کی امان میں رہے گا ۔

description: وہ ذات اقدس جو ہر شے اور ہر چیز کی نگرانی و حفاظت کرتا ہے۔
wazeefa: بعد غسل دو رکعت نفل پڑھ کے سچے دل سے جو شخص یہ اسم ایک مرتبہ پڑھے اللہ تبارک وتعالی اس کا ظاہر و باطن پاک فرما دیں گے ۔ اور جو شخص ایک سو پندرہ [۱۱۵] مرتبہ اس اسم کا ورد کرے تو انشاء اللہ تعالی پوشیدہ چیزوں پر مطلع ہوگا ۔

description: وہ بڑے اقتدار والا جس کا اقتدار سب پر حاوی ہے۔

translation: بکھرے ہووں کو یکجا کرنے والا
description: وہ جو ہر شے کو کسی بھی جگہ جب چاہے جمع کر سکتا ہے
wazeefa: جس کے اعزّہ و احباب منتشر ہوگئے ہوں وہ چاشت کے وقت غسل کرکے منہ آسمان کی طرف اٹھا کر دس مرتبہ [یا جامع] پڑھے اور ایک انگلی بند کرلے، اس طرح ہر دس مرتبہ پر ایک ایک انگلی بند کرتا جائے ۔ آخر میں دونوں ہاتھ منہ پر پھیر لے انشاء اللہ تعالی سب یکجا ہوجائیں گے ۔ اگر کسی کی کوئی چیز گم ہوجائے تو [اللھم یا جامع الناس لیوم لاریب فیہ اِجمع ضالتی] پڑھا کرے وہ چیز انشاء اللہ تعالی مل جائے گی ۔ جائز محبت کے لیے یہ دعا مجرب ہے ۔

description: وہ جو اپنی ذات میں خود کفیل ہے اور ہر چیز سے بے پرواہ ہے
wazeefa: روزانہ ستر [۷۰] مرتبہ یہ اسم پڑھنے والے کے مال میں اللہ تعالی برکت عطا فرمائیں گے انشاء اللہ تعالی کسی کا محتاج نہیں رہے گا ۔

description: وہ ذات اقدس جسکو کسی سے کوئی حاجت نہیں اور تمام مخلوقات و موجودات اس کی محتاج ہیں
wazeefa: اول و آخر گیارہ مرتبہ درود شریف اور گیارہ سو گیارہ [۱۱۱۱] مرتبہ یہ اسم بطور وظیفہ صبح یا شام عشاء کی نماز کے بعد پڑھنے والے کو اللہ تعالی غنائے ظاہری و باطنی عطا فرمائیں گے ۔

translation: روک دینے کی طاقت رکھنے والا
description: وہ جو رکاوٹوں کو دور کرتا ہے
wazeefa: میاں بیوی میں ناچاقی ہو تو بستر پر لیٹے وقت بیس [۲۰] مرتبہ یہ اسم پڑھ لیا کرے انشاء اللہ تعالی باہم الفت و محبت ہوجائے گی ۔ [یا مانع] بکثرت پڑھنے والا شر سے محفوظ رہے گا ۔

translation: نقصان پہنچانے کی قدرت رکھنے والا
description: وہ جو ایسی مخلوق پیدا کرتا ہے جو دوسروں کے لیے باعث مایوسی ہوتی ہے
wazeefa: شب جمعہ میں ایک سو [۱۰۰] مرتبہ یہ اسم پڑھنے والا انشاء اللہ تعالی تمام ظاہری و باطنی آفتوں سے محفوظ رہے گا اور اسے قرب الہی حاصل ہوگا ۔

translation: نفع پہنچانے کی قدرت رکھنے والا
description: وہ جو ایسی چیزوں کا خالق ہے جو اچھائیوں سے بھرپور اور نفع بخش ہیں
wazeefa: کسی بھی کام کے شروع کرتے وقت [۴۱] مرتبہ [یا نافع] پڑھنے سے کام انشاء اللہ تعالی حسب منشا ہوگا ۔ کسی سواری کا سوار بکثرت اس اسم کا ورد رکھے تو ہر آفت سے بچا رہے گا ۔ انشاء اللہ تعالی ۔

description: وہ جو اپنے نور سے تمام کائنات کو منور کیے ہوئے ہے اور اپنے بندوں کے چہروں، ذھنوں اور دلوں کو منور کرتا ہے
wazeefa: جو شخص شب جمعہ میں سات مرتبہ سورہ نور اور ایک ہزار [۱۰۰۰] مرتبہ یہ اسم [یا نور] پڑھے گا تو انشاء اللہ تعالی اس کا دل انوار الہیہ سے منور ہوجائے گا ۔

description: وہ جو اپنے بندوں کو کامیابی کی راہ دکھاتا ہے اور دوسروں کی بھلائی کے لیے کام کرنے کی ہدایت فرماتا ہے
wazeefa: ہاتھ اٹھا کر منہ آسمان کی طرف کرکے جو شخص اس اسم کو بکثرت پڑھ کر ہاتھ منہ پر پھیر لے تو اس کو انشاء اللہ تعالی کامل ہدایت نصیب ہوگی اور اہل معرفت مین شامل ہوگا ۔

translation: نمونے کے بغیر ایجاد کرنے والا
description: وہ جس نے کسی نمونہ کے بغیر کائنات میں حیرت انگیز چیزیں پیدا کی ہیں
wazeefa: با وضو [یا بدیع] پڑھتے پڑھتے اگر سوجائے تو جس کام کا ارادہ ہو اس کے متعلق خواب میں معلوم ہوجائے گا ۔ جس کو کوئی غم ، مصیبت و پریشانی پیش آئے تو وہ ایک ہزار [۱۰۰۰] مرتبہ [یا بدیع السمٰوٰت و الارض] پڑھے تو انشاء اللہ تعالی غم و پریشانی سے نجات نصیب ہوگی ۔ جو شخص نماز عشاء کے بعد بارہ سو [۱۲۰۰] مرتبہ بارہ دن تک [ یا بدیعَ العجائبِ بالخیرِ یا بدیعُ ] جس مقصد کے لیے بھی پڑھے گا ، انشاء اللہ تعالی وہ کام عمل کی مدت سے پہلے ہی ہو جائے گا ۔

description: وہ جس کے وجود میں پر کبھی فنا نہیں  اور وہ موجود ہے، ھمیشہ رہے  گا ، نہ پہلے اس پر فنا تھی اور نہ بعد میں کبھی فنا آئے گی
wazeefa: جمعہ کی رات کو ایک ہزار [۱۰۰۰] مرتبہ جو شخص اس اسم [یا باقی] کا ورد کرے گا اللہ تعالی اسے ہر قسم کے ضرر و نقصان سے محفوظ رکھیں گے اور انشاء اللہ تعالی اس کے تمام نیک کام مقبول ہوں گے ۔

translation: سب کے بعد موجود رہنے والا
description: وہ تمام کائنات کی کبھی نہ ختم ہونے والی ملکیت کا حامل ہے، انسان عارضی ملکیت کا حامل ہے۔ جب اسکی موت واقع ہوتی ہے تو وہ کچھ بھی نہیں رہتا
wazeefa: طلوع آفتاب کے وقت جو شخس ایک سو [۱۰۰] مرتبہ یہ اسم پڑھے گا ہر قسم کی رنج و سختی سے انشاء اللہ تعالی محفوظ رہے گا ۔ اور جو شخص مغرب و عشاء کے درمیان ایک ہزار [۱۰۰۰] مرتبہ پڑھے گا وہ ہر طرح کی حیرانی و پریشانی سے انشاء اللہ تعالی بچا رہے گا ۔

description: وہ جو اپنے غیر فانی منصوبوں کے مطابق ثبات عقل عطا کرتا ہے اور راہ راست دکھاتا ہے
wazeefa: روزانہ اس اسم کا ورد رکھنے سے تمام مشکلات دور اور کاروبار میں ترقی ہوگی ، ایک ہزار [۱۰۰۰] مرتبہ پڑھے ۔ اور جس شخص کو اپنے کسی کام کی کوئی تدبیر سمجھ میں نہ آتی ہو وہ مغرب و عشاء کے درمیان ایک ہزار [۱۰۰۰] مرتبہ [یا رشید] پڑھے تو یا تو خواب میں کوئی تدبیر معلوم ہوجائے گی یا دل میں اسکا القاء ہوجائے گا ۔

description: وہ جو اپنے بندوں کی سرکشی اور گناہوں پر جلد انتقام نہ لے
wazeefa: طلوع آفتاب سے پہلے اگر کوئی شخص ایک سو [۱۰۰] مرتبہ یہ اسم پڑھے تو انشاء اللہ تعالی اس دن ہر مصیبت سے بچا رہے گا اور دشمنوں و حاسدوں کی زبانیں بند رہیں گی ۔ اور کوئی شخص کسی مصیبت میں پھنس گیا ہو تو ایک ہزار بیس [۱۰۲۰] مرتبہ [یا صبور] پڑھے اس سے نجات پائے گا ۔
